message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too steep for me. Would you consider $60?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $60 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $100.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $100 is closer, but still a bit high for my budget. Could we settle around $70?
Hi Bob, you seem to really like this product! I'm trying to be fair, so I can go down to $85, my final offer.
